text: The 1994 FIFA World Cup was a football sporting event that was held in USA from June 17 to July 17, 1994. 24 teams took part from many countries. Brazil won the trophy after Roberto Baggio from Italy famously missed the last penalty in a penalty shootout. == Participants == === Africa === * Cameroon (CMR) • Squad * Morocco (MAR) • Squad * Nigeria (NGA) • Squad === Asia === * Korea Republic (KOR) • Squad * Saudi Arabia (KSA) • Squad === Europe === * Belgium (BEL) • Squad * Bulgaria (BUL) • Squad * Germany (GER) • Squad * Greece (GRE) • Squad * Italy (ITA) • Squad * Netherlands (NED) • Squad * Norway (NOR) • Squad * Republic of Ireland (IRL) • Squad * Romania (ROU) • Squad * Russia (RUS) • Squad * Spain (ESP) • Squad * Sweden (SWE) • Squad * Switzerland (SUI) • Squad === North and Central America === * Mexico (MEX) • Squad * United States (USA) • Squad === South America === * Argentina (ARG) • Squad * Bolivia (BOL) • Squad * Brazil (BRA) • Squad * Colombia (COL) • Squad == Results == === Round 1 === ==== Group A ==== Pos Team ROU SUI USA COL P W D L GF GA Pts Note 1 Romania -
